data.name: Lantern of Worlds - The Story of Samir
data.detailed_description:
The story of Samir is a 5 page PDF booklet which tells the story of a mysterious, dark organisation with a dark purpose.
Learn of one of its greatest members, Samir, and how he is the architect of the betrayal that befalls you, and of your ultimate destiny.

The PDF is available from your SteamApps\Lantern of Worlds game directory.

data.short_description: The story of Samir is a 5 page PDF booklet which tels the story of a mysterious, dark organisation with a dark purpose. Learn of one of its greatest members, Samir, and how he is the architect of the betrayal that befalls you, and of your ultimate destiny.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
